Key:
All right. Homeroom's done, so I should go
on a date with someone today.
...Shido-san.

I could've sworn I heard someone call my name.
Did it come from the hallway?
Oh, how nice of you to notice me.
K-Kurumi?!
Hey, come over here!
Huh? Sure...
*pant, pant*...
What's the matter?

Y-You know, you shouldn't appear out of
nowhere.

What would you do if you bumped into Tohka
or Origami...?
Were you worried about me?
No, that's not it. Huh?

(She's right. Why was I so focused on whether
or not she was seen? Am I worried about Kurumi?
Or did I just want to avoid another battle?)

(Argh, no good! I'm getting stuck in my head.
I did so because I wanted to.)
Shido-san, is something the matter?
Oh, um. Nothing.

Anyways Kurumi, why'd you come by my
classroom?
Oh, well...
I wanted to be the one to invite you.
...Invite?
Yes... Shido-san, will you go on a date with me?

(Okay. Gotta go with the flow. Seems like
Kurumi's changed, and is ready.)
Got anywhere in mind?

Anything is fine with me. I will let you escort
me, Shido-san.

(My heart jumped. She grabbed her skirt and
curtsied, almost like a princess—)
(No, no. Wait! Calm down! It's not like that!)

(I can't let my guard down too much. Kurumi
said she had a meal" in the alley.)"
(Wait, calm down!)
What's on your mind?
I-I just can't think of a good place to go.

Goodness. What am I to do with you?
That place will do, won't it?
O-Okay.
Now, after you, escort.
Okay. Here I go.

(Why does it feel like I'm letting her take
control?)
My! Shido-san, look! So many dogs and cats!

R-Right. It's a pet store. Have you never been
in one before?

I have. Not often. This one looks friendly.
Here, come hither.
Look how friendly it is.

Yeah, it's adorable. Oh, so you don't like
zoos, but you're okay with pet stores?

Yeah, it's adorable. Oh, when you think about
it, it's kind of sad, isn't it? They're stuck in
a small cage until someone buys them.

Shido-san, don't ruin a fun date with your
pessimistic musings.
S-Sorry...

(But I wonder what she's really thinking.
Outwardly, Kurumi's having fun, but...)

(Maybe the alligator was just being mistreated.
Thinking about it, I couldn't help but smile.)

(*sigh*. Sure seems like Kurumi loves animals.
She's having a blast just... petting them.)

(She's usually so... mature, but looking at her
now, she's acting so free-spirited. How
precious.)

What do you think, Shido-san? Do you think
this outfit is cute?
Totally. I think it suits you well, Kurumi.
Then, how about this?
Another good choice.
If I had to pick one, which would you prefer?
What? They both look nice. I can't decide.

Unacceptable answer. In times like these,
women want your opinion. Otherwise, she'll
think you simply don't care.
Oh, point taken. I'll be careful.
I like that you don't make excuses, Shido-san.
...! D-Don't make fun of me.
I'm not making fun of you. I meant it.

(I felt my heart skip a beat. I could tell that I
was beginning to blush. Kurumi's smile had
that effect on me.)
We've sure stopped by a lot of places.

Yes. I had so much fun that I've lost all sense
of time.
I'm kinda hungry. Wanna grab a bite?
Sure.

How about crepes from the shop? What do
you want, Kurumi?
I will leave it up to you, Shido-san.
Got it. Hang on a minute.

It's been a while since I had crepes.
It was so yummy!
That it was. I'm glad that I left it to you.
Right? ...*nom*.
Oh, Shido-san...
Hm?
There's some cream on your finger.
Oh...? You're right.
Let me see.
K...Kurumi?!
You can't move... Haaa.
K-Kurumi, that's enough.
No. There's still a spot...

(Kurumi's cheeks were getting rosier. Maybe
she's excited, or shy. Well, I couldn't really
see Kurumi getting shy.)
Ah. Okay, fine. Do as you please.

(Kurumi nodded with an alluring expression.
My heart was racing.)
A-Are you done?
...Yes. Thank you.
Perhaps, I enjoyed it a bit too much.
...Your face is red.
Oh, is that so? Hehe. I was excited.

Or, would you rather that I was shy?
Would you prefer that?
What the...

(Man, she can read me like a book. It's kinda
creepy. Either that, or it's written all over my
face.)

Well, I need to go soon. Hehe. Today was fun.
I even satisfied my sweet tooth.
Y-Yeah. Hey, Kurumi...
What is it?
That "meal" you mentioned...
Y-Yeah...
...Shido-san.
What is it?
I must go. Something has come up.
Something came up?
Yes. I have to hurry, so farewell for now.
Hey. Kurumi?!

The crepe was delicious. As were you,
Shido-san.
What?!

Kurumi... I forgot to ask her about this
afternoon.
HEY! WAIT! Kurumi...
